commentary: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth. This is the foundation of all religion, that there is a God, a specified Cause of all things. The world didn't happen by chance; it was created by a purposeful God.
The earth was without form, and void. Chaos preceded order. The Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters, preparing to bring life and order.
For God so loved the world. This is the gospel in a nutshell. God's love is the motivation for salvation.
